whatwedo.title: What we do
whatwedo.subtitle:
We operate in general commerce and in IT with a range of activities
ranging from those allowing the investment of capital to those which are philanthropic.

invest.title: Capital investment
invest.paragraph: We allow the placement of money in our activities, in the form of mezzanine investment, and in other projects in the form of a donation, a loan or an investment through our crowdfunding platform.

art.title: Promotion of Congolese arts and crafts
art.paragraph: We have created the digital market for this unique, high quality craftsmanship attributable to the incredible talent of Congolese artisans, with styles and influences specific to each region/ethnicity of the Democratic Republic of Congo.

it.title: IT services
it.paragraph: We respond to all types of IT needs: IS Governance (Audit & Consulting), Networks and Telematics, Data Analysis and BI, Cybersecurity, Infrastructure Acquisition and Maintenance, Acquisition or Implementation and Maintenance of application solutions (ERP, Web & Mobile Development, Integration), Digital Marketing (Web Ads, e-Reputation, Graphic Design) and Training.

health.title: Philanthropic activities
health.paragraph: We try, as best as we can, to help the needy in hospitals in the Democratic Republic of Congo, in general, and in Kinshasa, in particular. And through our Poor Healthcare Sponsorship Platform, we are reaching out to the world to enable others to do as we do.
